colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES DPAL LDAN DMAG ZOR RGYAL MO LA BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL BSAM 'PHEL YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI STOBS KYI 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA'I CHING GIS RGYAL PO'I GDUNG BRGYUD 'KHRUNGS PA DANG DANG PO 'BYOR PA PHUN SUM TSOGS PA 'JAM DBYANGS RDO RJE WANG GI SRAS PO DANG STOBS DANG LDAN TSE RING RDO RJES 'DI LTA BU BSDUS ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ,SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA SU MA TI MA NI PRADZNYAS BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA GU SHR'I CHOS RJE KUN DGA' RIN CHEN NO, ,'DI KYA RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DAR @006B ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, 'GRO BA KUN GYI BYANG CHUB SGRUB PA'I BAR CHAD ZHI ZHING RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYA KYIS GO 'PHANG MYUR DU THOB PAR GYUR CIG ,)
